Commentary: short and wide, tripe to start. Rohit is a tad tentative. Cut to cover point.
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Sharma, no run

Commentary: full, seams back in exaggeratedly. But Rohit gets some bat on his flick, the ball hits the pad. Bangladesh think of reviewing, but the umpire says '15 and gone'. Was that pad first?
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Sharma, no run

Commentary: a tad too wide, and short. The ball moves away. Outside the tramline.
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Sharma, 1 wide

Commentary: excellent lines, full around off, cramping Rohit for room, hit into the off side, towards cover.
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Sharma, no run

Commentary: very full, around off, Rohit watchfully defends. No big shots just yet, Rohit giving himself a chance.
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Sharma, no run

Commentary: good single there, on a length outside off, pushed towards cover point for a tight single. Makes it easily
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: tidy stuff from Abu. Full delivery outside off, Dhawan opens the bat face and carves the ball towards backward point.
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Dhawan, no run

Commentary: slow outside off, 81 kph, carved away towards backward point.
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Sharma, no run

Commentary: lovely shot from Rohit! Back of a length, very slow, around middle. He goes back and forces the ball through wide mid-on with as straight a bat as possible with that shot. Finds the gap, wide of the fielder
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Sharma, FOUR runs

Commentary: short and wide, slapped to extra cover. A yes and no. No eventually
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Sharma, no run

Commentary: finds the fielder again. Short and wide outside off, slashed away to the same extra cover fielder.
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Sharma, no run

Commentary: shortish outside off, punched to long-off from the back foot
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: beautifully played. He could have chosen the four or the wide, he chose four. Short down leg, Dhawan watches it late and helps it down to the fine leg boundary.
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Dhawan, FOUR runs

Commentary: good length around middle, Rohit is right behind the line to defend that back.
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, no run

Commentary: shortish and a tad wide, carved behind point. But just one to third man.
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: good length delivery around off, very tight, very tidy. Patted towards point. Dhawan wants one, Rohit says chill.
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Dhawan, no run

Commentary: 135 kph, a low full toss around middle and leg, punched away towards mid-off for one.
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Dhawan, 1 run

Commentary: a mis-timed lofted drive. Full and straight, trying to force the pace. The ball lobs right back over the bowler's head. Abu runs to his left from mid-on, but can't hold on. Goes down as a drop eventually.
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: that's timing for you. Goes full and wide, Dhawan leans into a drive and caresses the ball right into the gap at cover. Not forcing it, timing is his thing.
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Dhawan, FOUR runs

Commentary: on the pads this time, clipped away towards square leg. Should have been two there, but Rohit doesn't want it.
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: well bowled, on a length around off, Dhawan tries to work the ball into the leg side but improvises late. Defends to cover.
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhawan, no run

Commentary: back of a length outside off, carved off the open face down to backward point.
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhawan, no run

Commentary: a full delivery on middle and leg, 127 kph, pushed towards mid-on
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhawan, 1 run

Commentary: another cutter, down leg, hit away towards cover for one. Clearly struggling for timing, but he'll stick around
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: picks the slower ball, runs down to to the pitch, gets there and just goes through with his lofted drive. Clears the long-on boundary with ease. Makes run-scoring look so easy
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhawan, SIX runs

Commentary: short and quick, punched to long-on for one. 'Good stuff, Miraz,' yells Mushy
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: short again, around off, hit away to long-off
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dhawan, 1 run

Commentary: Rohit runs down and yorks himself. Full on leg, he jams it out.
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, no run

Commentary: 89 kph, flat on middle and leg. Rohit was waiting back this time, sees the flight, stays back and slog-sweeps the ball over midwicket. Too easy.
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, SIX runs

Commentary: 91 kph, some flight around middle, hit away towards long-on. but Miraz gets across to stop the ball
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, no run

Commentary: squeezes the ball through backward point for three. Full and wide, Rohit comes down and jams the ball away. Pulled back just inside the boundary
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, 3 runs

Commentary: a thick outside edge for four. A slower ball outside off, Rohit is deceived into a stroke. Gets a thick outside edge which flies away to the third man fence
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Sharma, FOUR runs

Commentary: good single. Back of a length outside off, Rohit comes down and slashes the ball towards backward point.
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: another slower ball, well bowled, around off, Dhawan checks his shot towards point. One more
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Dhawan, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length around middle and leg, pulled away to deep square leg. On the bounce. He'd be disappointed he didn't get more.
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: shortish and wide outside off, hit away towards mid-off for no run. There was one there. Rohit says that the fielder was back.
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Dhawan, no run

Commentary: four to finish. Full outside off, Dhawan gets underneath that and lofts the ball over mid-off. Good finish.
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Dhawan, FOUR runs

Commentary: slow outside off, pushed away to long-off. India's fifty is up.
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: slow outside off, nudged away to midwicket
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Dhawan, no run

Commentary: dropped! Liton Das, the keeper. Slow around middle and leg, Dhawan gets down and launches a heave towards midwicket. The fielder circles underneath the ball, Liton misjudges it to the point he has to dive to his right with one hand.
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Dhawan, FOUR runs

Commentary: nudged away towards the keeper
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Dhawan, no run

Commentary: slow outside off, Dhawan stays low and misses a sweep. A big appeal as ball hits pad, well outside the line
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Dhawan, no run

Commentary: excellent bowling, sees Dhawan coming and fires in the yorker, jammed out.
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Dhawan, no run

Commentary: very slow down leg, pushed away to long-on
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: lovely shot. Just lands inside the boundary. Short around middle, sits up for Dhawan to rock back and pull through square leg. Terrific batting.
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dhawan, FOUR runs

Commentary: on the pads, fired in, nudged away to square leg
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dhawan, 1 run

Commentary: strays down leg for a wide. Not that full, says Mushy
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, 1 wide

Commentary: overpitched and wide outside off, driven to deep cover for one.
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: too quick again, nudged away to deep backward square leg for one more
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dhawan, 1 run

Commentary: full and fast outside off, pushed to cover. Tidy end from Mehidy
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, no run

Commentary: looks for the reverse sweep. Slow outside off, toe-ended away to deep point
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Dhawan, 1 run

Commentary: short around off, pushed to long-on from the back foot
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: extremely quick down leg, clipped to deep square leg. Mushy the only person appealing. No, says the umpire and the bowler. Just bat.
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Dhawan, 1 run

Commentary: slow around middle and off, off the outside edge to short third man. Nicely bowled, nice and slow through the air.
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Sharma, no run

Commentary: short around middle and leg, punched to deep midwicket for one
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: good end again, flat and quick on middle, pushed back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Dhawan, no run

Commentary: full on leg, Rohit comes down and inside-edges the ball towards the keeper. A good run from Dhawan, asks his partner to come through
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length on middle and leg, swatted away to midwicket. Hurried for pace there.
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Dhawan, no run

Commentary: a slower delivery outside off, heaved away to midwicket again. The fielder had cleverly gone back, towards the edge of the circle, sensing a big shot.
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Dhawan, 1 run

Commentary: nicely bowled agai, jamming in a yorker around off, drilled away to long-on
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: superb delivery! 143 kph yorker on middle. Dhawan misses, Rubel uproots middle stump! Did that reverse just a touch? Full on middle, Dhawan backed away, made room for himself and just plain misses his drive. A stare from Rubel.
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Dhawan, OUT
Dismissal_text: S Dhawan  b Rubel Hossain 35 (27b 5x4 1x6) SR: 129.62

Commentary: lands just short of fine leg. Back of a length down leg, Raina shuffles across and flicks it away. Lands short of the fielder though.
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Raina, 1 run

Commentary: waist-high full toss outside off stump. Surprises Raina there. Flat-batted back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Raina, no run

Commentary: good length just outside off, slow through the air and spins into Raina. Punched off the back foot to mid on
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Raina, no run

Commentary: good length outside off again, Raina walks to the off side and smothers this - off his hips - to square leg
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Raina, 1 run

Commentary: full just outside off stump. Big stride forward and defended towards the non-striker
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Sharma, no run

Commentary: over long on! It's huge! Good length on middle stump but Rohit's well set now. Dances down the wicket, and converts it into a full ball. Full followthrough of the bat thereafter, and sent over the ropes
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Sharma, SIX runs

Commentary: low full toss on middle stump. Flicked off his toes to deep midwicket. Early call for two, and Rohit's back with ease
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Sharma, 2 runs

Commentary: good length on off stump, Raina shuffles towards the off side and taps it to mid on with soft hands. Forces the bowler to go chasing after it
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Raina, 1 run

Commentary: full on leg stump. Angling across Rohit, but he steps forward to negate the angle. Defended back to Fizz
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, no run

Commentary: good length on middle stump. Goes across Rohit's body as he tries to play the late cut. Just past his outside edge and to the keeper. Loopy delivery this time. Rolled his fingers over this one
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, no run

Commentary: back of a length outside leg stump. Comfortably turned off his hips to square leg. There's no one there, which means Rohit can return for the second run. He's playing the field
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, 2 runs

Commentary: short, but wide outside leg stump. Rohit tries to pull anyway, and bottom edged to short fine leg. They scamper across
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: big lbw appeal! But turned down. Good length on off stump, and Raina can't flick it towards the leg side. Hits his front leg, but the shout is turned down. Height, perhaps
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Raina, no run

Commentary: overpitched on off stump. Rohit pings his drive down the ground to long on. Can't get his bat completely under this delivery
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: full and wide outside off. It's the slower ball so Raina's through his shot early. Slapped to cover point, and they're off for a quick single
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Raina, 1 run

Commentary: sweeps the pacer! He expected the ball to be full, so Rohit shuffles across to the off side. Pitches on middle stump, and swept over short fine leg. Terrific bat speed. Moves to 49
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Sharma, FOUR runs

Commentary: slower ball, short outside off. Runs down the wicket and cuts to deep point. That's his 13th T20I fifty!
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: slower ball, full on off stump this time. Raina backs away - making some extra room - and slaps it over cover point. There's a man in the deep, though
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Raina, 1 run

Commentary: full on middle stump. Big wind up from Rohit, and crunches this drive to long off. He'll keep strike
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: full on off stump. Doesn't spin this time and Rohit's in the mood for some big shots. Tries to slog this over the bowler's head, but mistimed. Goes down the ground to long on
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: good length just outside off, turns into Raina. Tries to check-drive, but he's through his shot early. Off the bat's top half, but falls just in front of cover
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Raina, no run

Commentary: classic Raina! Full on off stump, gets down on one knee, and slogged over cow corner! How often does he play that shot
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Raina, SIX runs

Commentary: good length just outside off, Raina comes down the ground and uses his bottom hand to lift it over the bowler's head. Couple of bounces and into the long-off boundary. Safe shot, to be honest
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Raina, FOUR runs

Commentary: good length just outside off, stays on the back foot this time. Cut to point
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Raina, no run

Commentary: darts this full ball in. Lands on middle stump, and Raina's dancing down the wicket again. Tries to change his shot into the defense, but can only inside edge it onto his pads
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Raina, no run

Commentary: low full toss on middle stump, gets his front foot out of the way and crunches this check-drive to wide long on. Misfield in the deep, and Rohit gets back on strike
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, 2 runs

Commentary: excellent full ball on off stump. Rohit's drive comes off the bat's toe end. Trickles down to long on
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: full on middle stump, backs away to the leg side and driven to cover. Straight to the fielder there
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Raina, no run

Commentary: b>top edged! But falls safe behind the keeper. Bad fielding by Fizz at fine leg means the ball goes down for four. Short on middle stump, and Raina's pull goes over Mushi. Mustafizur did the hard work, but can't parry the ball back. Rubel isn't pleased!
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Raina, FOUR runs

Commentary: the yorker doesn't come off. It's a low full toss on leg stump, and Raina bunts this over mid on! Full extension of the arms, and the bottom hand from Raina comes into play again
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Raina, FOUR runs

Commentary: another low full toss on middle stump, this time it's been clipped to the leg side past midwicket. Work for the man at wide long on, who races to his left and stops the ball
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Raina, 2 runs

Commentary: full on middle stump and going across Rohit. Cut off the back foot, but played close to his body. Sent to deep point
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: good length on off stump, Raina goes deep into the crease and flat-bats it over midwicket. Creates that length by rocking back, and that's the fifty-run partnership!
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Raina, FOUR runs

Commentary: full just outside off, Raina backs away too much this time. Forced to reach at the delivery, and pushed to deep extra cover
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Raina, 1 run

Commentary: good length on off stump, Raina skips down the wicket and mistimes his pull to cow corner. Off the bat's top half
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: full on off stump, angling into Raina. Goes onto the back foot, and pulls over midwicket to the man in the deep
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Raina, 1 run

Commentary: good length on middle stump, goes onto the back foot and cuts this in front of square. The ball dribbles down to deep extra cover
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: full on leg stump. Tries to flick it towards midwicket, but takes the leading edge. Lobs over Raina and lands in front of the vacant mid-off region
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: good length on off stump, Raina makes room to the leg side, but his inside-out drive doesn't come off! Top edges it over short third man with the bat's open face. He'll take it, though
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Raina, FOUR runs

Commentary: Raina walks around the crease as Fizz runs in. Settles down eventually as the bowler delivers this back of a length. Pitches on off stump, and carved away to deep extra cover
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Raina, 1 run

Commentary: Taken in the stands! Good length on leg stump, and Rohit's quick to latch on to the length. Down on one knee, and smacked beyond deep midwicket. Sweet sound off the bat
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, SIX runs

Commentary: full on off stump. Rohit drives down the ground to long off. Overpitched enough so that the batsman can't get under this delivery
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: good length on off stump, Raina makes room and cuts. Played along the carpet to deep point
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Raina, 1 run

Commentary: slower ball wide outside off. Forces Raina to stretch at it. Slashed away past cover point to the man in the deep. Bangladesh won't mind these
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Raina, 1 run

Commentary: pulled over cow corner! Short on off stump and the pace doesn't bother Rohit much. Gets on top of this delivery and smacked towards the leg side. Enough elevation to take it way beyond the boundary
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Sharma, SIX runs

Commentary: almost chopped on! Yorker on off stump, and the batsman tries to run this down to third man. Bottom edges it and the ball trickles down to the leg side. Excellent delivery
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: Raina joins the party! Slower ball, back of a length outside off. Quick to gauge the length and takes a big stride forward. Swings hard across the line, and sends this for a flat six over deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Raina, SIX runs

Commentary: full on off stump. Raina makes extra room and tries to drive straight. Off the bat's inside half and runs down to long on. Frustration on Raina's face
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Raina, 1 run

Commentary: Twenty one off the over! Hider's been hammered this over. He hasn't bowled too well either. This is a full toss outside off stump and Rohit's got the liberty to free his arms. Pulled over deep midwicket once again! Real stand-and-deliver stuff from the India captain
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Sharma, SIX runs

Commentary: gold dust. Short on off stump, and zips off the surface. Goes over Raina's head with the batsman swaying away from the delivery's line
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Raina, no run

Commentary: good length on off stump, muscles this pull shot to long on. Off the bat's top half
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Raina, 1 run

Commentary: low full toss outside off stump, Rohit keeps his bat's face open and carves this over point! Hit over the infield, and no stopping that thereafter
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, FOUR runs

Commentary: full toss very wide outside off stump this time. Rohit knows where short third man is, and he opens the bat's face. Glanced past the keeper's right for another boundary. Caressed, really
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, FOUR runs

Commentary: wide outside off stump, Rohit's dancing down the wicket so it's a full toss eventually. Bunted down the ground to long off
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: full on leg stump, gives the bowler a charge but Fizz follows him. Muscled towards square leg for a quick run
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Raina, 1 run

Commentary: misses out on the fifty! Full on leg stump, and flicked off his pads to the leg side. It's hit uppishly, but doesn't have the distance. Taken at cow corner
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Raina, OUT
Dismissal_text: SK Raina c Soumya Sarkar b Rubel Hossain 47 (30b 5x4 2x6) SR: 156.66

Commentary: full on middle stump. Angling into him. Tries to turn this towards the leg side, but misses completely. Hits his back leg and goes down to third man. That hurt!
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, 1 leg bye

Commentary: full on middle stump. Plays a cross-batted shot to deep midwicket. Gets Sharma on strike
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Karthik, 1 run

Commentary: overpitched on middle stump. Rohit tries a big heave to the leg side, but inside edged onto his boots. Appeal for lbw,  but the umpire isn't interested
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, 1 run

Commentary: excellent yorker just outside off. Opens the bat's face and sends it down to deep point
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Karthik, 1 run

Commentary: yorker on off stump. Smacked back to Rubel, and he sticks his hand out. That stops the ball, but the batsmen want the single anyway. Harakiri, eventually. Rubel collects the ball, and walks across to the non-striker's end to run Rohit out. India finish on 176 for 3.
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, OUT
Dismissal_text: RG Sharma run out (Rubel Hossain) 89 (61b 5x4 5x6) SR: 145.90

Commentary: good length outside off, angling away, pushed towards extra cover from the back foot.
Commentary_short: Mohammed Siraj to Tamim Iqbal, no run

Commentary: that's a poor delivery. Very bad. Short and wide, and then further angling away. Tamim lays into a cut, does not bother keeping that down. Flies through point for four.
Commentary_short: Mohammed Siraj to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

Commentary: much better lines, on a length on a fourth-stump channel, defended towards cover
Commentary_short: Mohammed Siraj to Tamim Iqbal, no run

Commentary: Tamim runs down, looking to beat the ball, but he mis-times it towards cover. The fielder runs in but the ball takes an awkward spin away and rolls away
Commentary_short: Mohammed Siraj to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: nice timing from Liton. Good length on middle and leg, flicked away through midwicket for a couple. Timing there.
Commentary_short: Mohammed Siraj to Liton Das, 2 runs

Commentary: on a length, wide outside off, carved off the open face down to third man for one.
Commentary_short: Mohammed Siraj to Liton Das, 1 run

Commentary: Liton comes down, and misses a full toss. That was not what he was expecting. And so he completely misses a hit-me-out-of-Colombo delivery. But India want to review. It's well outside the line, says HawkEye. Poor review.
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Liton Das, no run
Washington Sundar to Liton Das, no run

Commentary: excellently bowled. Liton backs away but it's a well-executed yorker. Liton can only jam it out.
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Liton Das, no run

Commentary: runs down, doesn't quite get to the pitch, but is close enough to the length to lift the ball over mid-off. Nicely played.
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Liton Das, FOUR runs

Commentary: sees him coming again and bowls it wider and much shorter! Lovely piece of spin bowling. Liton somehow chooses the worst possible shot, opting to work the ball from well outside off. He wasn't close to the pitch nor was he adept at improvisation. So the ball went through a big gap between bat and pad. Karthik does the rest.
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Liton Das, OUT
Dismissal_text: Liton Das st †Karthik b Washington Sundar 7 (7b 1x4 0x6) SR: 100.00

Commentary: drifts on the pads, nudged down to short fine leg.
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: back of a length outside off, punched away to mid-on from the back foot
Commentary_short: Thakur to Tamim Iqbal, no run

Commentary: fine shot. Tamim backs away, exposes all his stumps. Thakur bowls it full and straight, drilled through cover for four.
Commentary_short: Thakur to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

Commentary: four more. Full and wide from Thakur, Tamim slices the ball off the outside half, behind point. Quick outfield, four.
Commentary_short: Thakur to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

Commentary: smashed for six. This is tripe from Thakur. Tamim shuffles across, Thakur bowls a short delivery down leg. Tamim helps himself, way over fine leg for six.
Commentary_short: Thakur to Tamim Iqbal, SIX runs

Commentary: short again, four more. Digs it in, the ball sits up for Tamim, pulled over midwicket so easily. Cannot bowl short here. Another shocker of an over from Thakur, 18 off 5 balls.
Commentary_short: Thakur to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

Commentary: nicely played. Back of a length on middle, nudged away to deep square leg
Commentary_short: Thakur to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: worked away towards mid-on for one
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: full outside off, driven towards cover for a run.
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: strays down leg, wide.
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Tamim Iqbal, 1 wide

Commentary: quick on the pads, nudged away to deep midwicket, 100 kph, a dart from Sundar
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: a wild heave from Sarkar. Not very good batting, it's a dart again. Sarkar heaves across the line, he's nowhere near the ball. The ball finds a big gap between bat and pad, and goes through to hit leg stump.
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Soumya Sarkar, OUT
Dismissal_text: Soumya Sarkar  b Washington Sundar 1 (3b 0x4 0x6) SR: 33.33

Commentary: slow on middle and off, worked down to short fine leg
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: another dart, around off, pushed to long-on for one
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: starts with a low full toss, driven to long-off for one
Commentary_short: Chahal to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: slow on middle, pushed back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Chahal to Tamim Iqbal, no run

Commentary: flat outside off, another very quick delivery. Tamim misses a sweep, struck on the pad well outside the line
Commentary_short: Chahal to Tamim Iqbal, no run

Commentary: slow on middle and off, worked to wide mid-on for one
Commentary_short: Chahal to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: fantastic stop from Rohit. Lots of flight outside of, Mushfiqur nails a drive towards Rohit at cover, who dives to his right and stop three.
Commentary_short: Chahal to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: short and slow, worked to midwicket. Very tidy over again
Commentary_short: Chahal to Tamim Iqbal, no run

Commentary: another flighted delivery, swatted away towards cover for one run.
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: terrific bowling. Just slows this up on middle and leg, and the ball turns, to beat the outside edge and strike Tamim in  front of middle. Going over?
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Tamim Iqbal, no run

Commentary: flat outside off, punched away to cover
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Tamim Iqbal, no run

Commentary: and bowled! Flat down leg, Tamim walks across, looking to drag the ball over short fine leg, but the ball bounces is a tad slow off the pitch. Tamim misses the heave, the ball goes on and hits leg stump
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Tamim Iqbal, OUT
Dismissal_text: Tamim Iqbal  b Washington Sundar 27 (19b 4x4 1x6) SR: 142.10

Commentary: poor delivery, short, wide and asking to be hit. Mahmudullah creams a cut through point. Fantastic start
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Mahmudullah, FOUR runs

Commentary: comes charging down, gets to the pitch, maybe too close, but still drills a lofted drive past mid-off. No half measures, just smashed.
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Mahmudullah, FOUR runs

Commentary: slow on middle, defended back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Chahal to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: just over backward point! Mushfiqur stays low, gets in position to play the reverse sweep and hits it well. Just over the fielder.
Commentary_short: Chahal to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

Commentary: slow down leg, Mushfiqur comes down and drives to cover
Commentary_short: Chahal to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: slow on middle and leg, played back towards the bowler
Commentary_short: Chahal to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: the slider, quick down leg, Mushy misses a flick, struck on the pad
Commentary_short: Chahal to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: on the pads, nudged away to deep midwicket for one
Commentary_short: Chahal to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: a yorker on middle, pushed to long-on
Commentary_short: Shankar to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: full and straight again, flicked behind square. But just one as fine leg runs quickly across
Commentary_short: Shankar to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: good stop again. Short and wide from Shankar, carved towards KL at backward point. Dives to his left, saves two, maybe four.
Commentary_short: Shankar to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: full on off, pushed to long-on. Just one.
Commentary_short: Shankar to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: a full delivery outside off, Mahmudullah gets forward and pushes the ball to cover
Commentary_short: Shankar to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: a slower ball outside off, swerving away, tapped down towards short third man, just one
Commentary_short: Shankar to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: very slow, very wide, anticipating the big shot from Mahmudullah. Left alone, wide.
Commentary_short: Chahal to Mahmudullah, 1 wide

Commentary: very full around off, smashed back towards Chahal. Dives to his left, but the ball goes through. Long-off keeps them down to one
Commentary_short: Chahal to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: very slow and very wide outside off, another wide.
Commentary_short: Chahal to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 wide

Commentary: the conventional sweep, flat down leg, swept down towards deep backward square leg
Commentary_short: Chahal to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: spin! Flat around off, the ball turns away late, takes the leading edge down towards third man.
Commentary_short: Chahal to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: he's picked out deep midwicket. Short delivery around off, Mahmudullah rocks back, looking to pull the ball into the stands but gets no timing. All he can do is pull the ball to deep midwicket.
Commentary_short: Chahal to Mahmudullah, OUT
Dismissal_text: Mahmudullah c Rahul b Chahal 11 (8b 2x4 0x6) SR: 137.50

Commentary: slow on middle and leg, smothered back
Commentary_short: Chahal to Sabbir Rahman, no run

Commentary: slow through the air, outside off, pushed to cover. Tidy
Commentary_short: Chahal to Sabbir Rahman, no run

Commentary: full and straight, nudged to midwicket
Commentary_short: Shankar to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: well bowled, earns himself a dot ball. Sees the batsman coming and giving room. The bowler bowls a full, wide one, creeps underneath
Commentary_short: Shankar to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: full outside off, moving away, pushed towards mid-off. Dhawan dives to his right, saves three
Commentary_short: Shankar to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: a short delivery around off, pulled away to deep square leg. Just one
Commentary_short: Shankar to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

Commentary: full and wide outside off, mis-timed drive to mid-off earns Mushy one
Commentary_short: Shankar to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length outside off, carved to point.
Commentary_short: Shankar to Sabbir Rahman, no run

Commentary: good length outside off stump. Angling into the batsman as he tries to drive to over. The bat hits the pad so he can't bring out the full followthrough. The ball goes past his outside edge and they appeal for the caught behind. The umpire's not interested
Commentary_short: Mohammed Siraj to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: slapped past wide long on! Good length on middle stump, dances down the wicket and flat-bats it over midwicket
Commentary_short: Mohammed Siraj to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

Commentary: full on off stump, and tailing inwards. Mushfiqur is stuck in two minds, manages to open the bat's face. Takes the edge and runs past the keeper's right. Well played in the end
Commentary_short: Mohammed Siraj to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

Commentary: goes short this time! And the umpire's having none of it. Called wide. Pitched on off stump, and zipped straight over the relatively short batsman's head. Siraj isn't pleased, and Rohit looks unhappy
Commentary_short: Mohammed Siraj to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 wide

Commentary: good length on off stump, Mushfiqur backs away to the leg side and shimmies down the wicket. Converts this into a half-tracker and smacked over mid off. Hits the boundary on the full. That'll be a maximum
Commentary_short: Mohammed Siraj to Mushfiqur Rahim, SIX runs

Commentary: good length just outside off, slower ball on this occasion. Smothered off his hips to deep backward square with soft hands
Commentary_short: Mohammed Siraj to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: good length wide outside off. Defended off the back foot to cover. Ends the over well, Siraj
Commentary_short: Mohammed Siraj to Sabbir Rahman, no run

Commentary: full and wide outside off. Leans into the drive and hits it uppishly over cover. Played with the bat's open face. No one square behind cover, and Mushfiqur goes past thirty
Commentary_short: Shankar to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

Commentary: full on middle stump, uses his wrists to work it towards cow corner. They're taking two, but the throw from the deep is a direct hit! He's safe though
Commentary_short: Shankar to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

Commentary: back of the hand slower ball. Pitches just outside off stump. Driven down the ground to deep extra cover this time
Commentary_short: Shankar to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: short on middle stump. Going down the leg side and Sabbir helps it for a boundary. Swivels and pulls along the ground past deep backward square. Great bat speed!
Commentary_short: Shankar to Sabbir Rahman, FOUR runs

Commentary: slower ball just wide outside off. Pitches on a good length, and tapped off the front foot to cover. They're off in a flash for the run
Commentary_short: Shankar to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

Commentary: full on off stump, flicked off his pads to deep midwicket. Played in the vacant area, which means they'll come back for the second. A big over: 14 off it
Commentary_short: Shankar to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

Commentary: tossed up on leg stump, spins into the right hander thereafter. Tries to sweep, but top edged over the keeper. Gave that ball quite the rip, Chahal
Commentary_short: Chahal to Sabbir Rahman, 1 leg bye

Commentary: full just outside leg stump, down on one knee and swept to deep backward square. They walk across for a run
Commentary_short: Chahal to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: full very wide outside off, Sabbir stretches to the off side and drags his sweep to Dhawan at deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Chahal to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

Commentary: good length wide outside off, turning further away. The batsman's forced to reach at it, and his cut takes the under edge. Hits the keeper's pads and ricochets towards short third man
Commentary_short: Chahal to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: flighted on a good length wide outside off. Tentatively pokes at it, and sent to cover point. Mushi wants the single, but Sabbir says no
Commentary_short: Chahal to Sabbir Rahman, no run

Commentary: flatter on middle stump, Sabbir rocks back, pulls, and sends this over cow corner! Stands tall and manages to slog this into the stands. Just the perfect length for him to latch on to
Commentary_short: Chahal to Sabbir Rahman, SIX runs

Commentary: good length, but wide outside off. Opens the bat's face and plays the late cut to third man
Commentary_short: Thakur to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length outside off. Chops it off the back foot past point. Mistimed, really, so that'll only be a single
Commentary_short: Thakur to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

Commentary: full on off stump. Slightly slower this time and the batsman is through his defense too early. Off the bat's top half as it takes a leading edge, but falls short of the bowler
Commentary_short: Thakur to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: overpitched wide outside off. Crunches this drive square to deep extra cover. Dhawan the man there
Commentary_short: Thakur to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: short outside off, the batsman charges down the wicket and drags his pull to the leg side. Played along the ground - with quite a lot of power behind it - but straight to the man in the deep. Slight misfield there
Commentary_short: Thakur to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

Commentary: short and wide outside off, cut off the back foot to point and they're off for the run. Could be dangerous, but the throw is awry at the non-striker's end
Commentary_short: Thakur to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: back of the hand slower ball on off stump. Pitches on a full length and the batsman has to wait for eternity before the  ball gets to him. Big wind up, and crunched to deep extra cover
Commentary_short: Shankar to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: Good effort from Siraj at deep backward square, but goes down as a missed opportunity. Full on leg stump, and clipped over square leg. Was in the air for a while but the fielder couldn't get to it. Also the fifty partnership
Commentary_short: Shankar to Sabbir Rahman, 2 runs

Commentary: full toss on middle stump, charges down the wicket and slogs it to deep midwicket. Off the bat's top half
Commentary_short: Shankar to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

Commentary: good length, wide outside off. The batsman makes extra room, and slaps it to deep point. Once again the slower ball to force the batsmen to create their own pace
Commentary_short: Shankar to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: chance of a run out, but Shankar misses! Full, and slow on middle stump. Tries to slog-sweep towards the leg side, but can't connect. The ball trickles away to Shankar with Sabbir halfway down the wicket. Athletic effort from the bowler, but his throw can't break the stumps. Sabbir was in too, replays suggest
Commentary_short: Shankar to Sabbir Rahman, no run

Commentary: slower ball yorker on middle and leg. Squeezed to midwicket, but no one's there! Forces Shankar to chase after it, which means the batsmen will collect two
Commentary_short: Shankar to Sabbir Rahman, 2 runs

Commentary: full outside off stump, driven away from his body. Not hit well, so only to cover
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: tosses it up on middle stump, Sabbir charges down the wicket but is cramped for space. Can only tap it back to Sundar
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Sabbir Rahman, no run

Commentary: overpitched wide outside off. Played with the bat's open face. Driven to deep point this time
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

Commentary: full wide outside off, and spinning into the batsman. Mushfiqur premeditates to play the reverse sweep, but he's in no position to play that. Misses by a mile
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: excellent from Sundar! Very full, but wide outside off. Goes under the batsman's bat and well collected by the keeper
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: tossed up outside off, comes down the wicket and smacks this over Sundar's head. Doesn't have a lot of power behind it, which means long off can intercept
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

Commentary: full outside off stump. Sabbir dances down the wicket to try and slog it towards the leg side. But no connection off the bat. Through to the keeper
Commentary_short: Thakur to Sabbir Rahman, no run

Commentary: back of a length outside off, stands tall and pulls it over midwicket. Threads the gap between long on and deep midwicket. The extra pace helps Sabbir bunt it away
Commentary_short: Thakur to Sabbir Rahman, FOUR runs

Commentary: full outside off stump. Opens the bat's face and taps it over point. Sundar's there in the deep, who runs to his left and cleans up from near deep backward point
Commentary_short: Thakur to Sabbir Rahman, 2 runs

Commentary: breaks the partnership! Rattles off stump. Good length just outside off, another wild leg-side swing from the batsman and the ball goes under his bat. Breaks the top of off, and Thakur gives out a big scream
Commentary_short: Thakur to Sabbir Rahman, OUT

Commentary: good length just outside off. Opens the bat's face and taps it past point for a single
Commentary_short: Thakur to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

Commentary: good length wide outside off again. Chooses to keep strike by chopping it down to short third man for a walking single
Commentary_short: Thakur to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: short and wide outside off, waits for the delivery to get to him, and crunches this cut past point. Back-to-back fifties for the little man. Just enough room for Mushi to free his arms
Commentary_short: Mohammed Siraj to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

Commentary: scooped! Full on middle stump, and the batsman shuffles across to the off side. Ramps it over the keeper, thereafter. Dangerous shot, but looks great when it pays off
Commentary_short: Mohammed Siraj to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

Commentary: full and wide outside off, forced to reach at it and slapped to deep point
Commentary_short: Mohammed Siraj to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: good length just outside off, muscled to mid off but Mehidy wants the single. Raina's throw at the non-striker's is good, but isn't a direct hit. Mehidy survives
Commentary_short: Mohammed Siraj to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length slower ball outside off. Mushfiqur tries to ramp it over the keeper, but can't connect
Commentary_short: Mohammed Siraj to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: Is that out?! Taken by Siraj off his own bowling, but it was a waist-high full toss. Mushfiqur tried to pull, but came off the bat's top half. Siraj wasn't sure whether that was a no ball or not, so has a shy at the stumps as well. The umpires want to have a second look. Looks touch-and-go really. We await the final decision... and no ball given! A free hit to go with that
Commentary_short: Mohammed Siraj to Mushfiqur Rahim, (no ball) 1 run

Commentary: full and wide outside off. Mehidy backs away and slaps this over point! Just the extra room to free his arms, and slashes very hard at it. No one behind square on the off side and that's 16 off the over.
Commentary_short: Mohammed Siraj to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, FOUR runs

Commentary: full and wide outside off, crunches this drive past cover. Manish Pandey's at wide long off, and he does well to keep it down to a two
Commentary_short: Thakur to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

Commentary: full on the fourth-stump line. He tries to slog this over the leg side, but can't connect. Misses the shot, and the ball barely misses off stump. Was in the slot, nonetheless, to be sent into the stands
Commentary_short: Thakur to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: knuckle ball on middle and leg, bunts it down the ground to long on. Only a single, so Thakur won't mind
Commentary_short: Thakur to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: full just outside off. Sliced over point to the man in the deep. The required run-rate is now over 20
Commentary_short: Thakur to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

Commentary: good length wide outside off, cut off the back foot to deep extra cover. How will Thakur end his spell?
Commentary_short: Thakur to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: full just outside off, slapped square to Rahul, but he's got no chance of a single. Bangladesh will need 28 off the final over
Commentary_short: Thakur to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

Commentary: good length just outside off stump. Plays the late cut to short third man and they're off for a quick single
Commentary_short: Mohammed Siraj to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: good length outside off, flat-batted over the bowler's head, but Raina's safe as a church at long off. Comfortable catch well inside the ropes
Commentary_short: Mohammed Siraj to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, OUT
Dismissal_text: Mehidy Hasan Miraz c Raina b Mohammed Siraj 7 (6b 1x4 0x6) SR: 116.66

Commentary: good length on middle stump, angling into Mushi but he glances this over short third man! Well improvised by backing away to the leg side
Commentary_short: Mohammed Siraj to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

Commentary: short outside off, but way too short. Loops over Mushfiqur's head and he'll have to bowl that one again. Rohit isn't quite pleased
Commentary_short: Mohammed Siraj to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 wide

Commentary: full on middle stump, backs away and crunches this drive past cover. No chance for Manish Pandey in the deep! What a terrific shot from the Bangladesh keeper
Commentary_short: Mohammed Siraj to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

Commentary: slower ball wide outside off, but well inside the tramlines. Mushfiqur thought it was wide, so let it go. Poor judgment on his behalf
Commentary_short: Mohammed Siraj to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: good length wide outside off again. Tries to cut but Mushfiqur can't connect. Through to the keeper on the bounce and India win by 17 runs!
Commentary_short: Mohammed Siraj to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run
